amendment.description: An amendment numbered 23 printed in Part A of House Report 118-602 to prohibit funds from being made available to implement or enforce Corps of Engineers memorandum CERE-AP, issued by the South Atlantic division on July 9, 1996, relating to "Approval of Perpetual Beach Storm Damage Reduction Easement as a Standard Estate.".

vote.text: On agreeing to the Luna amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.

action.text: House amendment agreed to: On agreeing to the Luna amendment (A010) Agreed to by voice vote.
